page.title: 13"Social Walking"
page.content: As part of developing{social } {contact}between parents and children at Danesfield School a number of evening walks on the{Quantocks}have been arranged. The organisation is quite relaxed as it is impossible to fit these in round everyones other engagements and certainly there is no control over the weather. One such walk was cancelled as it wasn't possible in June to see 25 metres through the swirling moorland mist! Various numbers of{children with {their parents}join the{teacher,}now acting in the role of walk leader and guide. The walks try to combine an experience of both the{open moorland } and the{wooded combes. } It is no coincidence however that the walks often go via the garden of the{Bicknoller Inn}where a pleasant{social event}is rounded off.
